headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: The Coronation Of King Charles III; Their Majesties Move To The Chapel Of St Edward. Aired 7-8a ET

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: The Lord protect you in all your ways and prosper all your work in his name.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: The Lord give you hope, and happiness, that you may inspire all your people in the imitation of his unchanging love.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: The Lord grant that wisdom and knowledge be the stability of your times, and the fear of the Lord, your treasure.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: May God pour upon you the riches of His grace, bless you, and keep you in His holy fear, prepare you for a happy eternity and receive you at the last into immortal glory.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAM, PRINCE OF WALES
utterances.sentences: I, William, Prince of Wales, pledged my loyalty to you, and faith and truth I will bear on to you as your liege man of life and limb. So, help me God.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Who hath made heaven and earth.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Who hath made heaven and Earth.

utterances.speaker: WELBY
utterances.sentences: Blessed be the name of the Lord.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Now and henceforth, world without end.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: Now and henceforth, world without end. Amen.

utterances.speaker: WELBY
utterances.sentences: Christ, our King, make you faithful and strong to do His will, that you may reign with Him in glory; and the blessing of God Almighty, the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit, rest upon you and all whom you serve, this day, and all your days. Amen.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.sentences: Thou art the King of glory, O Christ. Thou art the everlasting Son of the Father.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.sentences: When thou tookest upon thee to deliver man, thou didst not abhor the Virgin's womb.
